statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_alerts
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM inventory_alerts WHERE inventory_level < 10
SELECT id, product_name, inventory_level, last_updated FROM inventory_alerts ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT product_name, alert_threshold, notification_email FROM inventory_alerts WHERE alert_threshold > 50
SELECT id, product_name FROM inventory_alerts WHERE inventory_level < alert_threshold
SELECT * FROM inventory_alerts ORDER BY product_name DESC, last_updated ASC;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM inventory_alerts WHERE inventory_level < alert_threshold;
SELECT DISTINCT notification_email FROM inventory_alerts WHERE notification_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM inventory_alerts WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, inventory_level, notification_email FROM inventory_alerts WHERE inventory_level > 50 ORDER BY inventory_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT alert_name, alert_type FROM alerts WHERE threshold > 100;
SELECT alert_name, description FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE price BETWEEN 10.00 AND 50.00;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity, last_updated FROM inventory_data WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical';
SELECT alert_name, threshold FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 3;
SELECT alert_name, description FROM alerts WHERE threshold > 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity FROM inventory_data ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT alert_name, alert_threshold FROM alerts WHERE alert_enabled = true;
SELECT notification_type, recipient_email FROM notifications ORDER BY notification_sent_at DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM inventory_data WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT alert_name, alert_description, alert_threshold FROM alerts WHERE alert_enabled = true ORDER BY alert_threshold DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT alert_name, alert_description, alert_threshold FROM alerts WHERE alert_enabled = true;
SELECT notification_type, notification_content, recipient_email FROM notifications WHERE notification_sent_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM inventory_data ORDER BY product_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE alert_threshold > 50 AND alert_enabled = true ORDER BY alert_threshold ASC;
SELECT * FROM alerts LIMIT 10;
SELECT alert_name, alert_description FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'email';
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY product_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_history WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND quantity_changed > 10;
SELECT * FROM alerts;
SELECT alert_name, alert_description FROM alerts WHERE trigger_condition = 'High';
SELECT product_name, product_quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY product_quantity DESC;
SELECT notification_type, notification_content FROM notifications WHERE notification_type LIKE 'e%';
SELECT product_name, transaction_date FROM inventory INNER JOIN stock_history ON inventory.product_id = stock_history.product_id WHERE transaction_type = 'sale';
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY triggered_at DESC;
SELECT alert_type, notification_method FROM alerts WHERE id = 2;
SELECT message FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' LIMIT 3;
SELECT item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT recipient_email, status FROM notifications WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY sent_at;
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY triggered_at DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT notification_method, alert_type, message FROM alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' OR alert_type = 'Warning';
SELECT notification_method, COUNT(*) AS total_notifications FROM alerts GROUP BY notification_method HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND unit_price > 100 ORDER BY quantity ASC, unit_price DESC;
SELECT recipient_email, notification_method, sent_at FROM notifications INNER JOIN alerts ON notifications.alert_id = alerts.id ORDER BY sent_at ASC, recipient_email DESC LIMIT 10;
